pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detecting Anomalies in Data // Implements Collective And Point Anomaly (CAPA) arXiv:1806.01947, Multi-Variate Collective And Point Anomaly (MVCAPA) arXiv:1909.01691, and Proportion Adaptive Segment Selection (PASS) doi:10.1093/biomet/ass059 methods for the detection of anomalies in time series data.
